Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Lisbon (Saldanha), Hotel Real Parque is minutes from El Corte Ingles Shopping Center and Dr. Anastacio Goncalves Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Center for Modern Art and Dolce Vita Shopping Monumental Mall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 153 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). This hotel also features gift shops/newsstands and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 3 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Lisbon (Saldanha), Hotel Real Parque is minutes from El Corte Ingles Shopping Center and Dr. Anastacio Goncalves Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Center for Modern Art and Dolce Vita Shopping Monumental Mall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

El Corte Ingles Shopping Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Dr. Anastacio Goncalves Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Center for Modern Art - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Dolce Vita Shopping Monumental Mall - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Saldanha Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Atrium Saldanha - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Gulbenkian Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Edward VII Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Hospital Curry Cabral - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Marques de Pombal Square - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Instituto Superior Tecnico - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Campo Pequeno Bullring - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Culturgest - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Hospital Dona Estefania - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Medeiros e Almeida Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Real Parque is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Real Parque is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Essential Information:

Please note: Free entrance to the REAL PALACIO HOTEL Health Club (2 minutes away walking) with Gym, Sauna, Turkish Bath, and Jacuzzi. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
